ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: the Companions of the Left: what of the Companions of the Left?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Then those of the left hand -- how (unhappy) will be those of the left hand!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: And the People on the Left: and how miserable will be the People on the Left!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: The people of the left hand - those whose books of records will be placed in their left hands. How miserable they will be!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And those on the left – how (wretched) are those on the left!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And those on the left -- how (unfortunate) will be those on the left!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And (as to) the companions of the left hand; how wretched are the companions of the left hand!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Companions of the Left (O Companions of the Left!)
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And (then) those on the left hand; what of those on the left hand?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Those on the Left -- how unlucky are those on the Left!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And those on the left hand; how miserable shall those on the left hand be!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: And the People of the Left Hand—and what are the People of the Left Hand?!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And the Companions of the Left Hand,- what will be the Companions of the Left Hand?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And those on the Left Hand (i.e. those who will be given their Record in their left hands), Who will be those on the Left Hand? (As a disgrace for them, because they will enter Hell).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Companions of the Left, what are the Companions of the Left?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And those on the Left—what of those on the Left?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And the companions of the left - what are the companions of the left?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [56:9] And those of the left [hand] (al-mash’ama means al-shimāl, ‘left’), each of whom is given his record [of deeds] in their left hands — what of those of the left [hand]? — an expression of contempt for their status on account of their admittance into the Fire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And (then) those on the left hand) these are the dwellers of the Fire who will be given their scrolls in their left hands; they are the ones about whom Allah said: "These are destined for hell, and I care not"; (what of those on the left hand) again arousing the wonder of His Prophet: and what do you know, Muhammad, about the humiliation, punishment and chastisement suffered by the dwellers of hell?
